alert.note: Alert for Bayamon; Catano; Guaynabo; San Juan; Toa Baja (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 22 at 8:53PM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM AST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following counties, Bayamon, Catano, Guaynabo, San Juan and Toa Baja. * WHEN...Until 1045 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 853 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Up to 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... San Juan, Guaynabo, Bayamon, Sabana Seca, Trujillo Alto, Toa Baja, Carolina, Dorado, Levittown, Candelaria, Candelaria Arenas, Campanilla, Ingenio, San Jose and Mucarabones. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.

area.areaDesc: Bayamon; Catano; Guaynabo; San Juan; Toa Baja
